REUTERS.UNKNOWN: F f1511 reute d f BC-CBI-<CBH>-MAY-BUY-UP 10-20 0047

TEXT.TITLE: CBI <CBH> MAY BUY UP TO 500,000 OF ITS SHARES
TEXT.BODY: CBI Industries Inc said it may repurchase up to 500,000 of its common shares which will be used for employee stock ownership plans and other business purposes. The company has 21.8 mln common shares outstanding. Reuter
